hero.description: Here, I share about projects I work on and ideas I love, mostly about tech & startups. Since this a lab, don't be surprised if I experiment... 😜 👊🏾
hero.title: Welcome to my lab 👋🏾!

featured-projects.title: Featured projects
featured-projects.description: One of the most fascinating about programming is that one does not need too much in order to go from ideas to products.

fluantly.title: Fluantly
fluantly.description: Too many people know too many grammar rules but don't have confidence to speak a new language. Fluantly does not care about rules... Just understand and be understood!
